thread.title: Tahir Bhasin is left out on the sets of ‘Force 2’
thread.title_full: Tahir Bhasin is left out on the sets of ‘Force 2’

author: Deccan
title: Tahir Bhasin is left out on the sets of ‘Force 2’
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 07, 2015, 19.43 pm Mumbai: With several cameos in the past, Tahir Bhasin finally won accolades with his grey role in ‘Mardani’. He is currently away shooting for the sequel of 'Force' with John Abraham and Sonakshi Sinha. But he is, at times, felt ignored by the leading cast. An insider revealed, “John and Sonakshi are spending quality time on the sets of ‘Force 2’, while Tahir was given a cold shoulder". The actor felt left out amidst the lead pair hanging out on the sets. On many occasions, he is not given attention by the leading cast. Meanwhile, John and Sona are having lots of fun on the sets.” John and Sona! Why are you being mean to this new boy?
